channel.description: Recent content in others on STEM Notes

item.title: Configuration File: config.toml
item.description: This is the Engimo’s configuraion file ( config.toml ) file of this site: #------------------- # # config.toml # # # # Hugo configuration # # ------------------ # # Website base URL #baseURL = "http://localhost:1313/" # dev #baseURL = "https://patevs.github.io/STEM-Notes/" # ghpages baseURL = "https://stem-notes.netlify.com/" # netlify # english languageCode = "en-us" # Website title title = "STEM Notes" # build directory default: "public" # set to docs for ghpages deploy #publishDir = "docs" # for smart copyright line, leave this blank and check [params.
